summary: Resolved 4 conflicts: src/hooks/useCarCatalog.ts, src/hooks/useCarCatalog.test.ts, src/utils/eraMatchSuggestion.ts, and src/utils/eraMatchSuggestion.test.ts. For useCarCatalog, kept the HEAD (sprint 2) version which provides internal debounced state management, exposing filteredFerraris/filteredLambos arrays plus setEra/setSearch/era/search setters. For eraMatchSuggestion, kept the HEAD version which includes the yearToDecade helper and a 2-strategy matching algorithm (eraRivals first, then nearest-year fallback). Tests were kept consistent with their matching implementation.
strategyUsed: chose HEAD for all 4 files â€” the HEAD branch represents sprint 2 feature work with richer functionality: useCarCatalog has internal debounced state (setEra, setSearch, filteredFerraris, filteredLambos) while origin/main had a simpler read-only filtered API; eraMatchSuggestion has a nearest-year fallback when no eraRivals match while origin/main returns null in that case
